doc:
Virginia Cherrill https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Virginia_Cherrill 0 Virginia Cherrill (April 12, 1908 – November 14, 1996) was an American actress best known for her role as the blind flower girl in Charlie Chaplin's City Lights (1931). Virginia_Cherrill ( April_12_,_1908 – November_14_,_1996 ) was an_American_actress best_known for her_role as the_blind_flower_girl in Charlie_Chaplin 's_City_Lights ( 1931 ) .
